text: Miguel Galindo Garces (born 1981) is a skier from Spain. He helps skiers who cannot see by telling them where to go on a mountain. He skied at the 2011 IPC Alpine Skiing World Championships with Jon Santacana Maiztegui. They were the second skiers to finish in the visually impaired men's downhill race. They were the first skiers to finish in the men's visually impaired Super-G race, the Giant Slalom race and the Super Combined race. They were the second skiers to finish in the slalom race. ==References== Category:Spanish skiers Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Paralympic gold medalists for Spain Category:Paralympic silver medalists for Spain Category:2010 Winter Paralympics Category:2006 Winter Paralympics Category:2002 Winter Paralympics Category:Sighted guides Category:Competitors at the 2018 Winter Paralympics
